name: Head Librarian
description:
**She's a weary world's only librarian. She has no arms -- just two spindly legs and a bottomless craving for justice. She needs your help to put away books!**

== CONTROLS ==

Run back and forth to catch books on your head. Deposit them at the bookshelves on either side of the screen.

>[<-] Move Left

>[->] Move Right

>[SHIFT] Sprint

== CREDITS ==

>Programming: Daniel Giorlando

>Artwork: Julieanne Giorlando 

>Music credit: https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
